Sep 23, 2011 â€¢ Author: admin

Version 1.4.3 has one important bugfix in Redmine Connector:

    * #31572 Bug Redmine: Broken paging (issues, projects): duplicated items when count more than page limit and no query ID is specified * #30861 Bug minor mistakes in text labels in Redmine Editor
All changes in version 1.4.3
